Title: Synchronized Swimming
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Holly Schlesinger, Nora Smith (story)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: The Belcher children sign up for an independent study of synchronized swimming in lieu on participating in gym class. Linda disturbingly watches "pregnant yoga" and comes to the rescue of her children in the end.
